basic_info.description: My name is Quan Nghiem, and I am a passionate full stack software engineer. With a deep love for both front-end and back-end development, I strive to create exceptional user experiences while ensuring robust and efficient server-side functionality.
descriptionArray: My name is Quan Nghiem, and I am a passionate full stack software engineer. With a deep love for both front-end and back-end development, I strive to create exceptional user experiences while ensuring robust and efficient server-side functionality.

On the front-end, I excel in building responsive and intuitive user interfaces using modern web technologies such as HTML5, CSS3, and Typescript. I have hands-on experience with popular front-end frameworks like React and Angular, enabling me to create dynamic and interactive web applications.

When it comes to the back-end, I possess a strong foundation in server-side programming, database management, and cloud implementation. I have built RESTful APIs using ExpressJS and AWS lambdas, implemented authentication and authorization systems, and optimized database queries to ensure optimal performance.

I am a strong advocate for clean code, modular architecture, and best practices in software development. I am also a champion of thorough testing and errors logging for my product as well as a robust system to ensure continuous development and integration.
Thank you for taking the time to learn a bit about me. I look forward to connecting with you and discussing how we can work together to bring your ideas to life. Let's build something great!

projects.title: Animal Shelter
projects.description: The most expanded application I had opportunity to work with. I've learned many technologies and my code was reviewed by awesome curator. Application handles all adoption processess and allows to store all evidence on adopting animals from animal shelter.

projects.title: Photography
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. I was responsible for testing photography application that optimizes images with popular algorithms used by graphic editors like Pixlr or Adobe Photoshop. I've earned A grade :)

projects.title: 3D Object Viewer
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
